title: The Life
occurrences: I felt I'd been doing this since day one, my whole life.
A prostitute is a lady who spends her whole life out in the streets...
...and the more they succeed in accomplishing their goals in life...
Yes. Yes. But it's the life the girls chose, right?
...I wanted to change my life completely...
...so they cannot leave. They're looking for a better life.
They live well, live the good life, they become rich in this country.
They've told me I'm ruining my life...
...to do this and now I'm not going to change my life.
Anyway, I feel better every next day. I think I'll go on with this life.
I have a single wish in this life... I want everybody to be happy.
Anyway, as everyone else, I'd like something else from my life.
